title: how can i reinstall the league alpha client?
body:
every time i try to launch the the game it comes up with 'League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League Alpha client to try again.'

help? what do I do? ive triend uninstalling and reinstall the whole think like three times and its still not working..

replies.body:
You would need to perform a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to repair the updated client currently.  This error might have a much simpler workaround though, as your PC might be failing to locate the client.   Try the following steps to see if that fixes the issue:

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends
- Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe" and delete the file.
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

Let me know if that does the trick!
